name: Saving Princess of Mars
description:
Saving princess of Mars is an existential drama about a guy suddenly spawned on Mars. Also it's a personal cry for help we can all relate too...

But mostly it is just a platformer where a player needs to jump around, walk across, beat the monsters, find an item and save a hot babe!

This game raises many questions but also answers some of them... like:

  • Is there life on Mars?
  • What does it looks like (life on Mars, get your mind out of the gutter man!)?
  • Who is hiding behind the barn?
  • What is the winning lottery combination this week?

 

Well, I said "some" of the questions...

                               

Are you ready to save the princess of Mars?

There's only one way to find out!

Note:

Version (DEMO) d1.00 consists of the first level, additional levels and game functionality (achievements, new gameplay mechanics etc.) will be added thru future regular releases.

Although free this game is a test for potential shareware projects. Since the option where the game gets regular updates doesn't exist on Itch.io Release status will be set as "Released".
